main.name: João Maduro
main.description: A Computer Sciences Student with great interest in distributed systems, embedded systems, low-level programming, DevOps and gamedev
main.bio: Linux enthusiast and open-source supporter. Some of my interests include distributed systems, embedded systems, low-level programming, DevOps, Gamedev and with a huge fascination with the thin line between software and hardware. Always looking for hard challanges. What others may see as painful, I see as a great challange.

education.degree: Integrated Masters in Informatics and Computation Engineering (MIEIC)
education.description: Learned different fields about computer sciences like Operating Systems, OOP, Full-Stack Web Development, DevOps, Security, Distributed Systems and Gamedev.
